title: Kelly Kearse hit a grand slam home run
post:
I agree with Maria’s comment mostly, except I believe the ramifications of this information has far greater implications then just to refute the late Dr. McCrone’s theory…far more. I just happened to go to my personal physician yesterday for my annual, as I’ve mentioned before he is somewhat of a Shroudie also, anyways I directed him to Dr Kearse’s post and he confirmed to me that the whole notion that any blood can revert to AB in particular is nonsense and couldn’t fathom someone making that distinction…
Thanks again to Dr Kelly Kearse for her wonderful tutorial.
R.
author: Ron
